column3: str

Up to something? Me? Never! I am but a fun-loving imp, here to help my fellow revelers enjoy the Wake! And I can fashion you a <Emphasis>very</Emphasis> convincing guise for the masquerade. Ehehehe...
All I need is your memory of someone, someone who made a <Emphasis>strong</Emphasis> impression. Someone unforgettable, someone <Emphasis>powerful</Emphasis>. Yes, that's it...
All I need is for you to recall a journey, a journey unforgettable. Traverse your memories, and tell me what you see...
What will you say?
A journey to forge this realm anew.
A journey to end a conflict of one thousand years.
Good, good. Now think of someone remarkable you encountered in that time, someone <Emphasis>powerful</Emphasis>. Yes, that's it...
What will you say?
A Padjali woman as gentle yet indomitable as nature itself.
A stalwart Roegadyn woman of unshakable conviction.
A rugged Hyuran man unmatched in loyalty and valor.
A charming and compassionate Lalafellin lady of noble birth.
A courageous and clever Garlean man admired by many.
A wry and ambitious Garlean man who hates to be outdone.
A talented Lalafellin technician with a soft spot for a certain coinkeeper.
A Roegadyn man who escaped the Empire with his diminutive brother-in-tools.
An eccentric Miqo'te man crimson of both hair and eye.
A compassionate Hyuran woman who leads a “secret” organization.
A formidable Roegadyn man recognized for his tactical brilliance.
A stunning Miqo'te woman famed as a peerless songstress.
A Hyuran gentleman with an irrepressibly inquisitive nature.
A loyal Miqo'te woman who assists a gentleman inspector.
A Hyuran man who began life anew in a realm reborn.
An eager Lalafellin woman who is the coinkeeper of a “secret” organization.
A Hyuran man who is known as Eorzea's most fearsome goldsmith.
A blue-eyed Elezen man with a heart noble and true.
A tenacious half-Elezen woman who fights for what is just.
A robed Lalafellin woman of the intellectual persuasion.
A proud Elezen man unmatched in the art of the lance.
A daring Hyuran man who lives free as a bird.
A hardy Hyuran woman who keeps her skybound crewmates in check.
A Lalafellin woman with a knack for machines that soar the skies.
An Elezen man of noble birth fond of gossip and hearsay.
A Hyuran man who turned his gaze heavensward.
Nothing.
Ehehehe... That will do nicely. Don't worry, this won't hurt much at all! Just close your eyes...
The transfiguration can be removed by using the “Unveil” action, or by canceling the “Transfiguration” status effect.
Pay no mind to this little imp! I'm <Emphasis>very</Emphasis> busy during the Wake─I've no time for mundane mummers, no.
